"Ran": "Picking up a large number of enemy readings around the Resource Mining Rigs."
"The first response garrison are exhausted, so we're withdrawing them a few at a time."
"I'll give you all the support I can, so take over for them and defend the Mining Rigs."
"During fierce battles like these, atmospheric Photons become excited and crystallize as <pure_red>Collect Signs<c>."
"If you gather them and deposit them in a <pure_red>Mining Rig<c> or <pure_red>Delivery Device<c>, we can supply you with even more effective support options. Please take advantage of them."
